role_definition: Define, implement, track and assess the new business development plans for the enterprise or specific business divisions. This can cover business activities such as new market segment entry, product coverage and product specification development, brand development, new customer acquisition and existing customer, cross-sell/up-sell and retention.
example_of_use: Corporate strategy develops targets for new business acquisition in selected market segments
executive_summary: Define, implement, track and assess the new business development plans
key_features: Track progress towards goals and direct activity
